data.xmlpolicy:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Policy name="UssSelfWriteAttributes" createdby="uid=dsameuser" lastmodifiedby="uid=dsameuser" creationdate="1656319218329" lastmodifieddate="1656319218329" referralPolicy="false" active="true" >
<Rule name="user-read-rule">
<ServiceName name="sunAMDelegationService" />
<ResourceName name="sms://*dc=amconfig/sunIdentityRepositoryService/1.0/application/*" />
<AttributeValuePair>
<Attribute name="MODIFY" />
<Value>allow</Value>
</AttributeValuePair>
</Rule>
<Subjects name="Subjects" description="">
<Subject name="delegation-subject" type="AuthenticatedUsers" includeType="inclusive">
</Subject>
</Subjects>
<Conditions name="AttrCondition" description="">
<Condition name="condition" type="UserSelfCheckCondition">
<AttributeValuePair><Attribute name="attributes"/><Value>kbaInfo</Value>
</AttributeValuePair>
</Condition>
</Conditions>
</Policy>
